sqlMap.select: select * from VERSION where documentId = #id# order by number
select * from VERSION where documentId = #id# and deleted = 0 and number = (select max(number) from VERSION where deleted = 0 and documentId = #id#)

select * from VERSION where documentId = #id# and deleted = 0 and status = 'CONSOLIDATED' and number = (select max(number) from VERSION where deleted = 0 and status = 'CONSOLIDATED' and documentId = #id#)

select VERSION.*, DOCUMENT.title as documentTitle from VERSION, DOCUMENT where VERSION.documentId = DOCUMENT.id and VERSION.deleted = 0 and VERSION.status != 'DRAFT' and DOCUMENT.principal = 1 and DOCUMENT.deleted = 0 and DOCUMENT.typeOne = #typeOne# and DOCUMENT.typeTwo = #typeTwo# and number = (select max(number) from VERSION where deleted = 0 and status != 'DRAFT' and documentId = DOCUMENT.id)
select * from VERSION where deleted = 0 and status = 'IN_NEGOTIATION'
select * from VERSION where deleted = 0 and status IN ('IN_NEGOTIATION', 'IN_SIGN')
select VERSION.id, VERSION.number from VERSION where documentId = #id# and deleted = 0 and status != 'DRAFT' order by number
select * from VERSION WHERE documentId = #documentId# and number = #number#
select * from VERSION WHERE deleted = 0 AND documentId = #id# order by number

select VERSION.*, DOCUMENT.title as documentTitle, (SELECT count(1) FROM OBSERVATION WHERE OBSERVATION.privateObservation = 0 AND OBSERVATION.paragraphId IN (SELECT id FROM PARAGRAPH WHERE PARAGRAPH.versionID = VERSION.id)) as observationCount, (SELECT count(1) FROM OBSERVATION WHERE OBSERVATION.privateObservation = 0 AND OBSERVATION.addNewParagraph = 1 AND OBSERVATION.paragraphId IN (SELECT id FROM PARAGRAPH WHERE PARAGRAPH.versionID = VERSION.id)) as newParagraphCount from VERSION, DOCUMENT WHERE VERSION.documentId = DOCUMENT.id order by DOCUMENT.title, VERSION.number DESC
select count(1) from VERSION where documentId = #id#
sqlMap.update: update VERSION set documentId = #documentId#, number = #number#, name = #name#, description = #description#, creationDate = #creationDate#, upToCommentDate = #upToCommentDate#, status = #status#, deleted = #deleted#, hasDraft = #hasDraft# where id = #id#
update VERSION set status = #status# where id = #id#
update VERSION set status = 'CONSOLIDATED' where documentId = #id# and status = 'IN_NEGOTIATION'
update VERSION set status = 'CONSOLIDATED' where status IN ('IN_NEGOTIATION', 'IN_SIGN')
update VERSION set deleted = 0 where id = #id#
update VERSION set deleted = 1 where id = #id#
